jah wesun rodjandans miþ Iesua.
MARK 9.5 jah andhafjands Paitrus qaþ du Iesua:
rabbei, goþ ist unsis her wisan, jah gawaurkjam hlijans þrins, þus ainana jah Mose ainana jah ainana Helijin.
MARK 9.6 ni auk wissa ƕa rodidedi;
wesun auk usagidai.
MARK 9.7 jah warþ milhma ufarskadwjands im, jah qam stibna us þamma milhmin:
sa ist sunus meins sa liuba,
þamma hausjaiþ.
MARK 9.8 jah anaks insaiƕandans ni þanaseiþs ainohun gaseƕun, alja Iesu ainana miþ sis.
MARK 9.9 dalaþ þan atgaggandam im af þamma fairgunja, anabauþ im ei mannhun ni spillodedeina þatei gaseƕun, niba biþe sunus mans us dauþaim usstoþi.
MARK 9.10 jah þata waurd habaidedun du sis misso sokjandans:
ƕa ist þata us dauþaim usstandan?
MARK 9.11 jah frehun ina qiþandans: unte
qiþand þai bokarjos þatei Helias skuli qiman faurþis?
MARK 9.12 iþ is andhafjands qaþ du im:
Helias sweþauh qimands faurþis aftra gaboteiþ alla;
jah ƕaiwa gameliþ ist bi sunu mans,
ei manag winnai jah frakunþs wairþai.
MARK 9.13 akei qiþa izwis þatei ju Helias qam jah gatawidedun imma swa filu swe wildedun, swaswe gameliþ ist bi ina.
MARK 9.14 jah qimands at siponjam gasaƕ filu manageins bi ins jah bokarjans sokjandans miþ im.
MARK 9.15 jah sunsaiw alla managei gasaiƕandans ina usgeisnodedun jah durinnandans inwitun ina.
MARK 9.16 jah frah þans bokarjans:
ƕa sokeiþ miþ þaim?
MARK 9.17 jah andhafjands ains us þizai managein qaþ:
laisari, brahta sunu meinana du þus habandan ahman unrodjandan.
MARK 9.18 jah þisƕaruh þei ina gafahiþ, gawairpiþ ina, jah ƕaþjiþ jah kriustiþ tunþuns seinans jah gastaurkniþ;
jah qaþ siponjam þeinaim ei usdreibeina ina, jah ni mahtedun.
MARK 9.19 iþ is andhafjands im qaþ:
o kuni ungalaubjando!
und ƕa at izwis sijau?
und ƕa þulau izwis?
bairiþ ina du mis.
MARK 9.20 jah brahtedun ina at imma.
jah gasaiƕands ina sunsaiw sa ahma tahida ina;
jah driusands ana airþa walwisoda ƕaþjands.
MARK 9.21 jah frah þana attan is:
ƕan lagg mel ist ei þata warþ imma?
iþ is qaþ:
us barniskja.
MARK 9.22 jah ufta ina jah in fon atwarp jah in wato, ei usqistidedi imma;
akei jabai mageis, hilp unsara, gableiþjands unsis.
MARK 9.23 iþ Iesus qaþ du imma þata
jabai mageis galaubjan;
allata mahteig þamma galaubjandin.
MARK 9.24 jah sunsaiw ufhropjands sa atta þis barnis miþ tagram qaþ:
galaubja;
hilp meinaizos ungalaubeinais!
MARK 9.25 gasaiƕands þan Iesus þatei samaþ rann managei, gaƕotida ahmin þamma unhrainjin, qiþands du imma:
þu ahma, þu unrodjands jah bauþs, ik þus anabiuda:
usgagg us þamma jah þanaseiþs ni galeiþais in ina.
MARK 9.26 jah hropjands jah filu tahjands ina usiddja;
jah warþ swe dauþs, swaswe managai qeþun þatei gaswalt.
MARK 9.27 iþ Iesus undgreipands ina bi handau urraisida ina;
jah usstoþ.
MARK 9.28 jah galeiþandan ina in gard, siponjos is frehun ina sundro:
duƕe weis ni mahtedum usdreiban þana?
MARK 9.29 jah qaþ du im:
þata kuni in waihtai ni mag usgaggan, niba in bidai jah fastubnja.
MARK 9.30 jah jainþro usgaggandans iddjedun þairh Galeilaian, jah ni wilda ei ƕas wissedi,
MARK 9.31 unte laisida siponjans seinans jah qaþ du im þatei sunus mans atgibada in handuns manne, jah usqimand imma, jah usqistiþs þridjin daga usstandiþ.
MARK 9.32 iþ eis ni froþun þamma waurda jah ohtedun ina fraihnan.
MARK 9.33 jah qam in Kafarnaum.
jah in garda qumans frah ins:
ƕa in wiga miþ izwis misso mitodeduþ?
MARK 9.34 iþ eis slawaidedun;
du sis misso andrunnun, ƕarjis maists wesi.
MARK 9.35 jah sitands atwopida þans twalif jah qaþ du im:
jabai ƕas wili frumists wisan, sijai allaize aftumists jah allaim andbahts.
MARK 9.36 jah nimands barn gasatida ita in midjaim im jah ana armins nimands ita qaþ du im:
